entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the evening then changing to snow late in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
